mapper.select: SELECT orderDetailNo, partNumber, orderNo, orderdetailOrderQuantity, orderdetailAmount FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo} ORDER BY partNumber ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERDETAIL (partNumber, orderNo, orderdetailOrderQuantity, orderdetailAmount) SELECT c.partNumber, (SELECT MAX(orderNo) FROM `ORDER`), c.cartCount, c.cartCount * p.partPrice FROM CART c JOIN `ORDER` o ON c.memberNo = o.memberNo JOIN `PART` p ON c.partNumber = p.partNumber WHERE c.cartNo = #{cartNo}
mapper.select: SELECT od.orderDetailNo, od.partNumber, od.orderNo, od.orderdetailOrderQuantity, od.orderdetailAmount, p.partName, p.partPrice, p.modelNo, m.modelName, o.orderDate, o.orderStatus FROM ORDERDETAIL od JOIN PART p ON od.partNumber = p.partNumber JOIN MODEL m ON p.modelNo = m.modelNo JOIN `ORDER` o ON od.orderNo = o.orderNo WHERE od.orderNo = #{orderNo}
